languages.text: "Мы понесли тяжелые потери на мостике — множество офицеров, отвечавших за ключевые системы, погибло во время атаки. Последствия для судна... самые плачевные".
"The bridge suffered heavy losses — many of the officers responsible for key systems perished during the attack. The consequences for the vessel... are most grievous."
languages.original_text: "Мы понесли тяжелые потери на мостике — множество офицеров, отвечавших за ключевые системы, погибло во время атаки. Последствия для судна... самые плачевные".

traits.locale_text: "The bridge suffered heavy losses — many of the officers responsible for key systems perished during the attack. The consequences for the vessel... Are most grievous."
"The bridge suffered heavy losses — many of the officers responsible for key systems perished during the attack. The consequences for the vessel... Are most grievous."
"The bridge suffered heavy losses — many of the officers responsible for key systems perished during the attack. The consequences for the vessel... are most grievous."
"The bridge suffered heavy losses — many of the officers responsible for key systems perished during the attack. The consequences for the vessel... are most grievous."
"The bridge suffered heavy losses — many of the officers responsible for key systems perished during the attack. The consequences for the vessel... are most grievous."

languages.text: “舰桥遭遇了重大损失，许多负责关键系统的军官在这场袭击中丧生。这艘舰船恐怕会面临……极其悲惨的处境。”
languages.original_text: "The bridge suffered heavy losses — many of the officers responsible for key systems perished during the attack. The consequences for the vessel... are most grievous."

traits.locale_text: “舰桥遭遇了重大损失，许多负责关键系统的军官在这场袭击中丧生。这艘舰船恐怕会面临……极其悲惨的处境。”

languages.text: «El puente ha sufrido graves daños. Muchos de los oficiales responsables de sistemas esenciales han muerto durante el ataque. Las consecuencias para la nave... son catastróficas».
languages.original_text: "The bridge suffered heavy losses — many of the officers responsible for key systems perished during the attack. The consequences for the vessel... are most grievous."

traits.locale_text: «El puente ha sufrido graves daños. Muchos de los oficiales responsables de sistemas esenciales han muerto durante el ataque. Las consecuencias para la nave... son catastróficas».

languages.text: "Die Brücke erlitt schwere Verluste — viele der für die wichtigsten Systeme zuständigen Offiziere kamen bei dem Angriff ums Leben. Die Folgen für das Schiff ... sind äußerst schwerwiegend."
languages.original_text: "The bridge suffered heavy losses — many of the officers responsible for key systems perished during the attack. The consequences for the vessel... are most grievous."

traits.locale_text: "The bridge suffered heavy losses — many of the officers responsible for key systems perished during the attack. The consequences for the vessel... are most grievous."

languages.text: « Le pont a subi de lourdes pertes. Nombre d'officiers en charge des systèmes principaux ont péri pendant l'attaque. Les conséquences pour le vaisseau sont... extrêmement préoccupantes. »
languages.original_text: "The bridge suffered heavy losses — many of the officers responsible for key systems perished during the attack. The consequences for the vessel... are most grievous."

traits.locale_text: « Le pont a subi de lourdes pertes. Nombre d'officiers en charge des systèmes principaux ont péri pendant l'attaque. Les conséquences pour le vaisseau sont... extrêmement préoccupantes. »

languages.text: 「ブリッジは大きな被害を受けました。主要システムを担当していた多くの士官が、攻撃中に死亡したのです。船への影響は…何よりひどいですね」
languages.original_text: "The bridge suffered heavy losses — many of the officers responsible for key systems perished during the attack. The consequences for the vessel... are most grievous."

traits.locale_text: 「ブリッジは大きな被害を受けました。主要システムを担当していた多くの士官が、攻撃中に死亡したのです。船への影響は…何よりひどいですね」

languages.text: "Köprüde ağır kayıp verildi. Kilit önem taşıyan sistemlerden sorumlu birçok subay, saldırı esnasında hayatını kaybetti. Geminin durumu bu sebeple... Oldukça kötü."
languages.original_text: "The bridge suffered heavy losses — many of the officers responsible for key systems perished during the attack. The consequences for the vessel... are most grievous."
